entry.name: Range - Min
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: RangeMin
Description: Appearance distance Min [m]

entry.name: Range - Max
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: RangeMax
Description: Appearance distance Max [m]

entry.name: Duration - Min
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: LifeTimeMin
Description: Lifespan Min [seconds]

entry.name: Duration - Max
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: LifeTimeMax
Description: Lifespan Max [seconds]

entry.name: Delete Distance
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: DeleteDist
Description: Delete distance [m]

entry.name: Near Distance
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: NearDist
Description: Neighborhood judgment distance [m]

entry.name: Rotation Limit - Min
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: LimiteRotateMin
Description: Angle limit minimum [degree] Specify the Y-axis angle +- in front of the camera. 180 is omnidirectional

entry.name: Rotation Limit - Max
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: LimiteRotateMax
Description: Angle limit maximum [degree] Specify the Y-axis angle +- in front of the camera. 180 is omnidirectional
